post.title: can't dl images
post.content: bought a brand new s2. installed software twice (v 24.0) and rebooted. selected image(s) (they appear on both lcd and pc) and software hangs when i try to dl then says "camera can not be found" and software crashes. tried two different memory cards with same result. using xp/sp2, athlon xp 2700, abit va-10 mobo. any suggestions?
